text:
With APR enabled, the OS memory stats shown by the status servlet are incorrect
for Linux machines with >4G memory (real + swap).  The mem_unit value returned
by the sysinfo system call is ignored.  For <4G machines, mem_unit is set to 1
and the bug is not apparent.
creator: peter.grimshaw@gmail.com
yoavs@computer.org
text: Seems like a good patch and simple to apply.
Looks like someone beat me to it ;)
creator: yoavs@computer.org
